Text:
Why is there a remove "Windows Genuine Advantage"... if it is a corp ed ?
No activation in the corp ed.

This Is OEM w/o SP1 or SP2 ; during the update process, Windows Genuine Advantage will be installed ; M$ recently removed the ability to 'turn off' this anti-piracy measure. To download updates after 'advantage' is installed there is one simple step. 1. place 'javascript:void(window.g_sDisableWGACheck='all')' in the address bar and press the 'enter' key. then select custom or express. you now have access to any updates you wish!
You don't need a script to remove windows Genuine Advantage. Just click on your IE>Tools>Internet Options>Programs>Manage Ad-Ons>WGA  Highlight and disable.
I'm assuming by Corporate edition he means XP Professional
windows update now prevents the ability to disable windows advantage. the javascript listed above will allow you to continue to update windows.
Yes this is pro, and Windows Genuine Advantage is for Windows update and other microsoft downloads.
